title: Convex lens - image of obj at 8 cm from 10 cm lens

content.question: An object is located <math alttext="8.0 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> to the left of a convex lens that has a focal length of <math alttext="10.0 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>. Where is the image formed by the lens located?

choices.label: <math alttext="4.4 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> to the right of the lens
<math alttext="4.4 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> to the left of the lens
<math alttext="40 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>40</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> to the right of the lens
<math alttext="40 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>40</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> to the left of the lens

content.answer: <math alttext="40 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>40</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> to the left of the lens

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
